The Weiqiang Coal Mine is a shaft coal mine located in the Hengshan area of Yulin City, Shaanxi Province, with an annual construction scale of 6 million tons

operators: Shaanxi Yanchang Petroleum Group Hengshan Weiqiang Coal Industry Company
owners: Shaanxi Hengshan Imp.and EXP Co Ltd
web_search_companies.notes: Shaanxi Yanchang Petroleum Group holds a 51% stake in the operation.
